means: 支持( favor的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: No one favored dumbing down the magazine.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有人赞成降低杂志的专业水准。

sentence.Network_en: We hoped to be favored with your early answer.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们希望得到你尽早的回答.

sentence.Network_en: There are two forms of most - favored - nation treatment: conditional and unconditional.
sentence.Network_cn: 最惠国 待遇有两种形式: 有条件的和无条件的.
